footer.aboutText: The KOZZII Short Content Competition (KOSCOCO) is Cameroon's premier platform for discovering and celebrating creative talent in short-form video content.
footer.description: Cameroon's premier short content competition platform. Discover and celebrate creativity.
footer.newsletterDescription: Get updates on competition phases and winners.

prizes.hero.title: Win Big with KOSCOCO
prizes.hero.description: Compete for amazing prizes at the top 3 of each category and qualify to win the ULTIMATE PRIZE at the Grande Finale!
prizes.grandFinale.description: Top three winners in each category competes for the ultimate prize
prizes.top3.description: 1st place winner in each of the 5 categories
prizes.top10.description: Each finalist advancing to TOP 10 phase
prizes.categoriesSection.title: 5 Competition Categories
prizes.categoriesSection.description: Each category offers equal prize opportunities. Choose your passion and compete for glory!
prizes.totalPool.label: TOTAL PRIZE POOL
prizes.totalPool.description: With prizes distributed across 5 categories and multiple phases, this is Cameroon's biggest short content competition!
prizes.cta.title: Ready to Compete?
prizes.cta.description: Register now and start your journey to becoming KOSCOCO's next champion!
howItWorks.hero.title: How KOSCOCO Works
howItWorks.hero.subtitle: Your journey from registration to stardom in 6 simple steps
howItWorks.features.categories.title: 5 Categories
howItWorks.features.categories.descripti: Multiple talent categories to choose from
howItWorks.features.phases.title: 7 Phases
howItWorks.features.voting.title: Public Voting
howItWorks.features.judges.title: Judge Scores
howItWorks.steps.heading: Your Path to Victory
howItWorks.steps.description: Follow these six steps to showcase your talent and compete for amazing prizes
howItWorks.step1.title: Register & Choose One Or More Categories
howItWorks.step1.description: Sign up and select one or more exciting categories. Pay only 2,500 francs CFA per category.
howItWorks.step2.title: Upload Your Best Content
howItWorks.step2.description: Create and upload your 1-3 minute video showcasing your talent. Up to 2 videos per category!
howItWorks.step3.title: Get Approved & Go Live
howItWorks.step3.description: Our team reviews your submission to ensure quality. Once approved, your video goes live for the world to see!
howItWorks.step4.title: Public Voting Begins
howItWorks.step4.description: Share your video and gather votes! Public votes count for 60% of your total score. Get your network engaged!
howItWorks.step5.title: Progress Through Phases
howItWorks.step5.description: Compete through 7 exciting phases: TOP 500 → TOP 100 → TOP 50 → TOP 25 → TOP 10 → TOP 3 → GRANDE FINALE
howItWorks.step6.title: The ULTIMATE PRIZE
howItWorks.step6.description: Top performers in each category and the grand winner receive incredible prizes and recognition!
howItWorks.step6.highlight1: Top three winners in each category
howItWorks.step6.highlight3: The ultimate prize of 5 million FCFA
howItWorks.step6.highlight4: National and international fame and recognition
howItWorks.scoring.heading: How Winners Are Chosen
howItWorks.scoring.description: Your score is based on three key factors
howItWorks.scoring.publicVotes.title: Public Votes
howItWorks.scoring.publicVotes.descripti: The audience decides! Share your video to get maximum votes from supporters.
howItWorks.scoring.creativity.title: Creativity
howItWorks.scoring.creativity.descriptio: Our judges assess your originality, uniqueness, and creative expression.
howItWorks.scoring.quality.title: Quality
howItWorks.scoring.quality.description: Judges evaluate production quality, clarity, and overall execution.
howItWorks.cta.title: Ready to Showcase Your Talent?
howItWorks.cta.description: Join thousands of creators competing for amazing prizes. Register now and start your journey to stardom!

affiliate.subtitle: Track your referrals and earnings

affiliate.notEnrolled.title: Not Enrolled
affiliate.notEnrolled.description: You need to enroll in the affiliate program first
affiliate.referralLink.title: Your Referral Link
affiliate.referralLink.description: Share this link with others to earn commission
affiliate.referralLink.shareDescription: Share this link on social media, with friends, or anywhere you promote KOSCOCO
affiliate.balance.title: Available Balance
affiliate.balance.description: Request a payout when you reach the minimum threshold
affiliate.payout.dialogDescription: Enter your payout details. Requests are typically processed within 3-5 business days.

affiliate.payoutHistory.description: Track your payout requests and their status
affiliate.payoutHistory.emptyDescription: Request a payout when you accumulate at least 5,000 FCFA

affiliate.referrals.description: People who registered using your code
affiliate.referrals.emptyDescription: Start sharing your referral code to earn commissions!
affiliate.toast.payoutRequestedDescripti: Your payout request has been submitted for review
affiliateProgram.title: Join the KOSCOCO Affiliate Program
affiliateProgram.subtitle: Earn 20% commission by referring new participants to KOSCOCO
affiliateProgram.benefits.commission.des: Earn 500 FCFA for every participant you refer (20% of 2,500 FCFA registration fee)
affiliateProgram.benefits.sharing.title: Easy Sharing
affiliateProgram.benefits.sharing.descri: Get your unique referral link and share it on social media, websites, or anywhere online
affiliateProgram.benefits.tracking.title: Track Earnings
affiliateProgram.benefits.tracking.descr: Monitor your referrals and earnings in real-time through your affiliate dashboard
affiliateProgram.howItWorks.title: How It Works
affiliateProgram.howItWorks.step1: Fill out the form below to join the affiliate program (it's free!)
affiliateProgram.howItWorks.step2: Get your unique referral link from your affiliate dashboard
affiliateProgram.howItWorks.step3: Share your link with friends, followers, and your network
affiliateProgram.howItWorks.step4: Earn 500 FCFA commission for every participant who registers using your link
affiliateProgram.howItWorks.step5: Track all your referrals and earnings in your dashboard
affiliateProgram.form.title: Create Your Affiliate Account
affiliateProgram.form.description: Fill in the details below to get started
affiliateProgram.form.newUserDescription: Fill in your details below to create an account and join our affiliate program in one step!
affiliateProgram.form.name: Name
affiliateProgram.form.websiteDescription: Where will you share your referral link? (optional)
affiliateProgram.form.promotionMethodPla: Tell us about your promotion strategy (e.g., social media posts, blog articles, email newsletters, WhatsApp groups, etc.)
affiliateProgram.form.promotionMethodDes: Describe your plan to promote KOSCOCO to potential participants
affiliateProgram.form.agreeDescription: By joining the affiliate program, you agree to promote KOSCOCO ethically and follow our guidelines.

affiliateProgram.validation.lastNameMin: Last name must be at least 2 characters

affiliateProgram.validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

affiliateProgram.validation.termsRequire: You must agree to the terms and conditions
affiliateProgram.toast.enrolledDescripti: You're now part of our affiliate program. Redirecting to your dashboard...
